mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.ddh AS "ddh", a.xdrq AS "xdrq", a.yysj AS "yysj", a.ddlxdm AS "ddlxdm", a.zj AS "zj", a.fksj AS "fksj", a.khxm AS "khxm", a.yddh AS "yddh", a.sqtksj AS "sqtksj", a.tkly AS "tkly", a.tkshjg AS "tkshjg", a.yhpj AS "yhpj", a.pjxq AS "pjxq.YHZH", a.ddztdm AS "ddztdm", a.qydm AS "qydm.code", a.pszj AS "pszj.YHZH", a.note AS "note", a.lw AS "lw.LWBH", a.tqm AS "tqm", a.lwxtfs AS "lwxtfs", a.lwxzfs AS "lwxzfs", a.lyljfs AS "lyljfs", a.wxzsfs AS "wxzsfs", a.zyspfs AS "zyspfs", a.yjgzfs AS "yjgzfs", a.yjcgfs AS "yjcgfs", a.zf AS "zf", a.psyj AS "psyj", pszj.zjxm AS "pszj.ZJXM", lw.lwmc AS "lw.LWMC", lw.lwlxdm AS "lw.LWLXDM", lw.lwwj AS "lw.LWWJ", pszj.dzyx AS "pszj.DZYX", pszj.lxdh AS "pszj.LXDH"
LEFT JOIN t_paper lw ON lw.lwbh = a.lw LEFT JOIN t_expert pszj ON pszj.yhzh = a.pszj
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order WHERE xdrq >= #{beginDate} and xdrq < #{endDate}

SELECT
FROM t_order a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ${dataScope}
AND a.ddh LIKE '%'||#{ddh}||'%' '%'+#{ddh}+'%' concat('%',#{ddh},'%')
AND a.xdrq LIKE '%'||#{xdrq}||'%' '%'+#{xdrq}+'%' concat('%',#{xdrq},'%')
AND a.yysj LIKE '%'||#{yysj}||'%' '%'+#{yysj}+'%' concat('%',#{yysj},'%')
AND a.ddlxdm LIKE '%'||#{ddlxdm}||'%' '%'+#{ddlxdm}+'%' concat('%',#{ddlxdm},'%')
AND a.zj LIKE '%'||#{zj}||'%' '%'+#{zj}+'%' concat('%',#{zj},'%')
AND a.fksj LIKE '%'||#{fksj}||'%' '%'+#{fksj}+'%' concat('%',#{fksj},'%')
AND a.khxm LIKE '%'||#{khxm}||'%' '%'+#{khxm}+'%' concat('%',#{khxm},'%')
AND a.yddh LIKE '%'||#{yddh}||'%' '%'+#{yddh}+'%' concat('%',#{yddh},'%')
AND a.sqtksj LIKE '%'||#{sqtksj}||'%' '%'+#{sqtksj}+'%' concat('%',#{sqtksj},'%')
AND a.tkly LIKE '%'||#{tkly}||'%' '%'+#{tkly}+'%' concat('%',#{tkly},'%')
AND a.tkshjg LIKE '%'||#{tkshjg}||'%' '%'+#{tkshjg}+'%' concat('%',#{tkshjg},'%')
AND a.yhpj LIKE '%'||#{yhpj}||'%' '%'+#{yhpj}+'%' concat('%',#{yhpj},'%')
AND a.pjxq LIKE '%'||#{pjxq}||'%' '%'+#{pjxq}+'%' concat('%',#{pjxq},'%')
AND a.ddztdm LIKE '%'||#{ddztdm}||'%' '%'+#{ddztdm}+'%' concat('%',#{ddztdm},'%')
AND a.pszj LIKE '%'||#{pszj.YHZH}||'%' '%'+#{pszj.YHZH}+'%' concat('%',#{pszj.YHZH},'%')
AND a.note LIKE '%'||#{note}||'%' '%'+#{note}+'%' concat('%',#{note},'%')
AND a.tqm LIKE '%'||#{tqm}||'%' '%'+#{tqm}+'%' concat('%',#{tqm},'%')
AND a.lw = #{lw.LWBH}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, ddh, xdrq, yysj, ddlxdm, zj, fksj, khxm, yddh, sqtksj, tkly, tkshjg, yhpj, pjxq, ddztdm, qydm, pszj, note, lw, tqm ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{ddh}, #{xdrq}, #{yysj}, #{ddlxdm}, #{zj}, #{fksj}, #{khxm}, #{yddh}, #{sqtksj}, #{tkly}, #{tkshjg}, #{yhpj}, #{pjxq}, #{ddztdm}, #{qydm.code}, #{pszj.YHZH}, #{note}, #{lw.LWBH}, #{tqm} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_order SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, ddh = #{ddh}, xdrq = #{xdrq}, yysj = #{yysj}, ddlxdm = #{ddlxdm}, zj = #{zj}, fksj = #{fksj}, khxm = #{khxm}, yddh = #{yddh}, sqtksj = #{sqtksj}, tkly = #{tkly}, tkshjg = #{tkshjg}, yhpj = #{yhpj}, pjxq = #{pjxq}, ddztdm = #{ddztdm}, qydm = #{qydm.code}, pszj = #{pszj.YHZH}, note = #{note}, lw=#{lw.LWBH}, tqm=#{tqm} WHERE id = #{id}
